C I R C U L A R   13/ 2006 
 
In a meeting taken by Secretary (CA) today (11.8.2006), it was pointed out 
by the CISF that aircraft operators do not take over security removed items from 
the CISF staff in the Security Hold Area for further secure carriage and handing 
over to the passengers at destination.  
 
2. 
As per circular No. 25/2003 dated 1.9.2003, it is the responsibility of the 
aircraft operator to collect security removed items belonging to passengers from 
the security check point in the SHA and hand these over to the passengers at the 
destination as per the procedure prescribed vide the above quoted Circular.  
 
3. 
Instructions issued vide this Bureau Circular mentioned above are 
reiterated for strict implementation by all concerned with immediate effect.
